name: QL Tech
description:
QL Tech is an Australia-based company associated with providing clients with the best outsourcing solutions in the world of IT. We pride ourselves as individuals who have explored the vast ends of the spectrum when it comes to fields such as software development, application development, website development, digital marketing, and a lot more.
Our philosophy is to focus on 3 essentials for your business â€“ Development, Automation, & Growth. Our in-depth experience in development involves management of Wordpress, Magento, Joomla, and other platforms. We also help you know your way around languages and linguistic frameworks such as PHP, Yii PHP, and Smarty, including the development of entire frameworks themselves. Designing a designated brand image, logo or designing website layouts and other aspects of an online space are some of our specialties as well.
